noun.description: Absence or lack of moisture or liquid.
examples: dryness of the mouth may occur while you are taking this medicine
hand sanitizers contain ingredients that help prevent skin dryness

noun.description: Lack of interest, excitement, or embellishment; dullness.
examples: readers are repelled by the dryness of much of the matter
it does little to rescue the ordinary moment from dryness and tedium

noun.description: The quality in an alcoholic drink of not being sweet.
examples: there's a lovely dryness to this straw-colored wine
